heroTitle: Hey! I’mSiddharth Rai. An Engineer, Product Manager, Public Speaker and an Entrepreneur in the making.
heroSubtitle: Do you need a website for yourself? Need someone to manage your projects? Need a host for your event? You’re at the right place.

whatIDo.title: I Transform
whatIDo.description: I help businesses to scale and build their online presence by crafting for them custom software solutions including websites and apps.

whatIDo.title: I Develop
whatIDo.description: I am a tech enthusiast. I love tinkering with new tech/coding languages and build something cool out of it.

whatIDo.title: I Speak
whatIDo.description: I'm a public speaker and a host. Be it meetings or seminars or events, you may find me speaking to an audiance. In love with the stage and mic.

Experience.title: Freelancer
Experience.description: Working as a Freelancer. I design and develop websites and mobile apps for clients. I also host events and shows.

Experience.title: Product Manager
Experience.description: Worked as a Product Manager at Mindstix with cross funtiononal teams to build products that help in digital transformation of various industries.

Experience.title: Software Engineer
Experience.description: I worked as a Software Engineer at Mindstix. Well versed with various technologies used for web development along with UI/UX.

Experience.title: Co-CEO
Experience.description: Worked as the Co-CEO of the organization Sapphire in my University. Managed a team of almost 150 students and organized several events.
